title: Stanford AI Village [JUST 2023] Episodic memory of experience

definitions.Memory Stream: The memory stream comprises a large number of observations that are relevant and irrelevant to the agent's current situation. Retrieval identifies a subset of these observations that should be passed to the language model to condition its response to the situation.

summary: The slide discusses the concept of 'Episodic memory of experience' in the context of AI, specifically how a 'Memory Stream' is used to process observations relevant to an agent's current situation. It also explains the retrieval process and provides a formula for calculating the relevance of observations.
